short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PDF Shark is a powerful PDF converter tool. Convert PDF to DOC and DOC to PDF with just a simple drag-and-drop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PDF Shark is a top-notch PDF productivity tool that will get you covered!
PDF Shark is a powerful PDF converter tool. Converts DOC, XLS, PPT, and more into PDF files and from PDF back to DOC.  

with just a simple drag-and-drop. It takes seconds and is completely free to use.
By adding this extension to Chrome you are receiving the converting tool in your browser

Try it now!
